comment: The Land Bank should operate with transparency.
My primary residence is in the San Juan Islands.
I’m registered to vote in San Juan County.

The LB needs to consider soil health as the guiding principle of it's agricultural lands.

Hold meetings at times when a greater diversity of community members than is currently able to attend can participate.
